column3: This should show you the qrencode changes. https://github.com/fukuchi/libqrencode/compare/055f441af7eaa38cc794fe5a2e5bb236bbd54661...3.4\n
Probably should wait until we're closer to rc1 before bumping, in case there's more fixes?\n
@luke-jr Bumping sooner has the advantage over doing it last-minute that at least the new versions can get some longer testing.\n

I'm fine with upgrading all of those.

Though I agree that libprotobuf is the most risky of the bunch.
@luke-jr Yes, I agree with @laanwj. Bumping these early means they get more testing. If obvious bugfixes come in closer to release, we can certainly still pull them in.\n
Also agreed with @laanwj to take this in as soon as possible.\nTried a gitian build with this PR: https://builds.jonasschnelli.ch/pulls/6373/\n

The protobuf update seems to cause warnings:

```
protobuf-2.6.1\dist\include\google\protobuf\wire_format_lite_inl.h:383: Warning: comparison between signed and unsigned integer expressions [-Wsign-compare]
     for (int i = 0; i < new_entries; ++i) {
                       ^
```
